mapper.insert: insert into member(userId, userPwd, nickName, userEmail, gender, phoneNum, userName) value(#{userId}, sha1(md5(#{userPwd})), #{nickName}, #{userEmail}, #{gender}, #{phoneNum}, #{userName})

insert.if: insert into memberpoint(userId, point, pointWhy, recommend) values(#{userId}, #{point}, #{pointWhy}, #{recommend})
insert into memberpoint(userId, point, pointWhy, recommend) values(#{userId}, #{point}, #{pointWhy}, null)

mapper.select: select * from member where isdormant ="n" and isDraw="n" order by memberWhen limit #{startNum}, #{postPerPage}
select count(*) as totalCnt from member where isdormant ="n" and isDraw="n"
select count(*) as totalCnt from withdraw
select count(*) as totalCnt from member where TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, lastLogin, now()) >= 90
mapper.update: update member set isdormant = #{isdormant} where userId=#{userId}
